==Applies To==
* Web Application * Server-side
==What to Do==
Change the user's session ID when he logs in.
==Why==
Change session IDs during login to make sure that the session state corresponds to the authenticated user.
==How==
To change session IDs during login:
# **Find login functionality.** Find the code that is responsible for authentication. # **Change session IDs during login.** Add code that invalidates the current session ID and creates a new one.
